description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              • Vision:
              
              There are a lot of website and Smartphone run on iOS Operating system on the word and you are also one of user and have benefits from this system.
              
              Moreover, internet services on Website and Smartphone has changed our life as well.
              
              Besides to provide our service in Vietnamese market, Groot has a big plan to expand to Asia market. We believe about the young people in Vietnam who can present Groot services to the world by the strength and innovation of the youth.
              
              Would you want to join with us to build the new Smartphone applications on iOS Operating system?
              
              We are looking for the human resource in Vietnam and build a strong relationship. It is an opportunity for you to have more experience in iOS application, website services by teamwork. Then you have a chance to be a leader or Project Manager.
              

              - Mainly develop Smartphone application on iOS Operating system by Swift
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Age: 20 - 30 years old.
              
              Working time: 8h00 – 17:00
              
              High priority for people who have the experience of development web app, can work long term, have career passion, and not changing jobs so many times.
              

              + Required skill:
              
              Must have from over 2 experience years of ios app development by Swift
              
              Have experience of working for more than 3 projects and performance of 3 applications
              

              + Non-required skills/ advantage skills: (Advantage)
              
              Have experience of iOS app development by Objective-C
              
              Have experience of Android app development (Development language is not required - we focus on performance and current skills)
              
              Have experience of smartphone game development (Development language is not required - we focus on performance and current skills)
              
              Have experience of Front-end such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript; or Back-end such as Windows, Linux, have over 3 years experience of web app development of PHP or Ruby
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Once time in a year
